title: Uruk-hai Rampage (1U159)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Response: If your Uruk-hai wins a skirmish, remove (3) to make him fierce until the regroup phase.
Lore:	Victory breeds rage in Saruman's foul creations.
Rarity:	U
